toast2.message: You always throw the best parties for everyone else!  Happy Birthday!

toast4.message: I'm sorry its not a boat or a float trip...Happy Birthday!

toast5.message: I've always loved your birthday games!  Here's our chance to embarrass you!

toast6.message: Some things get better with age ... you're one of them! Happy birthday.

toast7.message: May this day bring to you all things that make you smile. Happy birthday!

toast8.message: Age is not a destination, it's a journey!

toast9.message: Another year is added, but also another opportunity for growth and experience.

toast10.message: Happy birthday on your very special day, I hope that you don't die before you eat your cake.
